title: Potentially infinite loop in ServerFixture::SpawnSDF causing test failure

content.raw:
The PhysicsTest.CollisionFilteringODE has failed several times in Jenkins with a Timeout after 240 seconds. I've traced the problem to a potentially infinite loop in [ServerFixture::SpawnSDF at line 784](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/0e2cbdaf75faaae74ed3163dc39bdd5c98ec6796/test/ServerFixture.hh?at=default#cl-783).

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64/232/testReport/junit/(root)/Results/test_ran/

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64/56/testReport/junit/(root)/Results/test_ran_2/

The test failure is intermittent. I see it consistently when compiled RelWithDebugInfo and when run without gdb on an ssh terminal without an X display. I found the place where it got stuck with some printf's.
content.html:
The PhysicsTest.CollisionFilteringODE has failed several times in Jenkins with a Timeout after 240 seconds. I've traced the problem to a potentially infinite loop in ServerFixture::SpawnSDF at line 784.

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64/232/testReport/junit/(root)/Results/test_ran/

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64/56/testReport/junit/(root)/Results/test_ran_2/

The test failure is intermittent. I see it consistently when compiled RelWithDebugInfo and when run without gdb on an ssh terminal without an X display. I found the place where it got stuck with some printf's.
